title: What Made Me Feverish With Passion

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
I hadn't seen Festa run since she graduated, but she was 
in my father's racing class, so I used to see her often.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
That's what surprised me. Even though she was a student at 
Tracen Academy, she hadn't changed a bit. On that day ——

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Festa was the opponent of a certain French Umamusume 
who had made a name for herself internationally.
choice_data_list: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
But that Umamusume wasn't planning on doing anything serious. 
She just wanted to run a little on a freestyle track that resembled 
the turf of her hometown.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
However, none of the girls present, except Festa, came forward 
to be her opponent. They said it was because "she was on a 
completely different level compared to them."

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
They were right. Their opponent was overwhelming in size and 
ability. The more seriously they ran, the more they'd realize the 
difference between themselves and her opponent, and they'd 
have nothing but despair to show for it. A race like that…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
"Ha… HAHAHA! That's it, don't hold back! 
This fire… is what I'm looking for!!"

text_block_list.name: French Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: "Ugh… HAAAAAAAHH!!!"

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
She brought out the true power of her opponent. The same 
opponent who violently outclassed her. Acting provocative, 
with a twinkle in her eye. Having fun… with a smile.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
"AAARRRGGG! Shut up, shut up, SHUT UP! 
Shut up, stupid heartbeat! I feel-"

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: "Alive…"
choice_data_list: (…Alive?)

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
In the end, Festa lost. Still, they were a neck's 
length apart. It was a photo finish. After the race, 
she fell to her knees, a complete wreck.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps it was a reaction to going beyond her limits, but she 
was a world-class Umamusume in a pre-debut body.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text: …Cough, cough…!
choice_data_list: Are you okay?!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I got excited… cough… cough… cough… excuse me…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text: …Trainer. Please, help that girl "live."

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
That girl used to hang out in back alleys and play dangerous 
games. Taking risks with bad company was an easy way for 
her to get her heart pumping.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
But the passion that brings her is just 
for kicks. What she's really after is…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
A race that ignites her instincts. 
That is the only moment she can let herself go.
choice_data_list: …A race that ignites her instincts.

text_block_list.text:
I think about that as I leave the hospital. The video 
I saw of her running was completely different from 
her performance at the tryout race.

The challenge is already clear. There are some races 
she can take seriously and others she can't.
choice_data_list: (The race I saw in that video, for one.)

text_block_list.text:
She was completely outclassed. The odds would've been 
10 to 1 in her opponent's favor. That's why. If she had won, 
she'd have been…
choice_data_list: <size=34>Is that the kind of gamble that ignites her passion?</size>
<size=34>Is that the kind of gamble that ignites her passion?</size>

text_block_list.text:
If one could intentionally create a gamble like that, I wonder if 
Nakayama Festa would always feel "alive".

I forced myself to dry swallow despite my parched throat. What I 
had come up with was just a fantasy. An unrealistic hypothetical.
choice_data_list:
If that was the case, maybe it would 
be what I could do to help her live.

If that was the case, maybe it would 
be what I could do to help her live.

text_block_list.text:
Could a method like "that" carry world-class 
talent to its fullest potential…?

That night. I asked Miho's dorm leader to let me 
stand at the dormitory's entrance for a while.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: …Hm? What are you…
choice_data_list: I thought I'd see you if I waited here.
I thought I'd see you if I waited here.

text_block_list.text:
Pointing to the trainer badge on my lapel, I explained 
that she was the one who helped me before and that 
I'd watched the tryout race.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it was you. I knew I had seen that suspicious 
person before. So… you came here to lecture me? 
You should take running more seriously.
choice_data_list:
I saw the video of you competing 
against a foreign Umamusume.

I saw the video of you competing 
against a foreign Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: …! Did you meet my teacher?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
That race was an illusion. Just a fluke. You saw the tryouts, 
you know what I mean. I'll never have a race like that again.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Worst case scenario, I throw a fit. I'll end up losing my debut 
and every maiden race that comes after, and that'll be that. 
…Some brat who was never able to really get fired up.
choice_data_list: I won't let that happen, I'll let you live.
I won't let that happen, I'll let you live.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: ….Wha?
choice_data_list: Let's go pick a fight against the world.

text_block_list.text:
If she wants a thrilling gamble, she should put herself in 
a situation where she has no choice but to be thrilled. 
She could even cut off all her escape routes.

One or zero? Admiration or scorn? It doesn't matter which one 
is at the end of the game, only that it's one or the other.

Later that day. Nakayama Festa and I arrived at a press 
conference for member of the "Golden Generation", 
El Condor Pasa.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
El Condor Passa, you finished in a respectable second place 
in the world renowned Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe. Since then, 
you've been on a prolonged hiatus.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I've been looking for someone to pass the mask onto 
for a while. But then I decided! The one who should win over 
the world is none other than myself!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Now, long term expedition plans are already in the making! 
You can look forward to seeing me as early as next year.
choice_data_list: <size=38>But first, we'll compete against you, and win.</size>
<size=38>But first, we'll compete against you, and win.</size>

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
A lost enemy. Don't you know that now, we are in the 
middle of a press conference for El, the world's most 
powerful Umamusume? You interrupted it and then 
challenged me… do you understand what that means?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. And you're gonna have to hand your right 
to challenge the world over to me, El.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
…You've finished the game and became a thing of the past. 
The one who can put that ticket to good use is me.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
choice_data_list: We're here to put our futures on the line.
We're here to put our futures on the line.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Challenge the El? The one who placed during the 
Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe? While she's being interviewed 
in front of the press before my debut?
choice_data_list: <size=34>And just like that, you'll be on the world's radar.</size>
<size=34>And just like that, you'll be on the world's radar.</size>

text_block_list.text:
With such big talk, the media has to take the bait. Her future 
will be the focus of attention from his debut race on, adding 
tension to every race.

If she wins, the world will celebrate her. If he loses, she'll be 
derided as a disappointment. Every race she'll take on from then 
on out is sure to be one that will catch the eyes of spectators.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Haha, if that were to happen every time, I'd have 
no choice but to get fired up. And what if I'm 
a complete failure in my race against El?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
If nobody thinks I'm even worth looking into after that, 
that's the end of the line, you know?
choice_data_list:
Isn't that kind of "fear" necessary 
in the games you play?

Isn't that kind of "fear" necessary 
in the games you play?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
…Haha, well damn. Suppose I'm the one who taught 
you such unnecessary things… wasn't I?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Let's fight for the future, El. Give the OK and I'll take care 
of the prep work. Before my debut.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
…! Are you treating the race against me as a preliminary 
challenge before your debut? I can't believe this! 
You must not know much about the world!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
But if I let an attitude like that slide, the world itself will 
be underestimated by everyone. So… defeat, humiliation, 
or despair. Which would you prefer?
Thus begins the gamble of a lifetime.
